titleStmt.title: Cover letters and transaction statement ending December 30, 1905, Lincoln Land Company

bibl.title: Cover letters and transaction statement ending December 30, 1905, Lincoln Land Company

msIdentifier.repository: McCracken Research Library, MS407 Bronson Rumsey Collection

div1.note:
Office of Lincoln Land Company
Rooms 33-36, 1241 O Street
Lincoln, Neb.
C. H. Morrill, President.
A. B. Minor, Sec'y and Treasurer.
Quotations of Prices Are Subject to Change without Notice.
div1.p: By request of Col. Cody, we send you herewith draft on the Chemical National Bank of New York No. 391544 of the First National Bank of this city for $11,000 as advance payment on proceeds of the one-half interest in the Cody property held by you as Trustee. A final accounting with statement andremittanceand remittance will be made at the usual time at the close of the year. Be kind enough to receipt and return the accompanying voucher.

div1.note:
Office of Lincoln Land Company
Rooms 33-36, 1241 O Street
Lincoln, Neb.
C. H. Morrill, President.
A. B. Minor, Sec'y and Treasurer.
Quotations of Prices Are Subject to Change without Notice.
div1.p: I hand you herewith statement of account of the one-half interest in the Cody, Wyoming property represented by you, showing all transactions for the six months ending Dec. 30, 1905.

The net balance for your half interest for that time is $12679.05, of which we remitted you $11,000.00, on the 14th ult. We now hand you herewith draft to your order for $1679.05, the balance. Please return voucher.
Statement of business transacted at Cody, Wyoming, by the Lincoln Land Company, with respect to the one-half interest of Bronson Rumsey, Trustee, for the six months ending December 30, 1905.
